name: Reginald HAWKINS, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF S.C.I.-HUNTINGDON, R.W. Lawler, ex rel., PA Parole Board, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Hawkins v. Pa. Department of Corrections of S.C.I.-Huntingdon

parties: Reginald HAWKINS, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF S.C.I.-HUNTINGDON, R.W. Lawler, ex rel., PA Parole Board, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

40 A.3d 1230
Reginald HAWKINS, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS OF S.C.I.-HUNTINGDON, R.W. Lawler, ex rel., PA Parole Board, Appellees.
